# UMAP & Tidyverse 

```{r, dpi = 300, fig.height=10, fig.width=10}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggcirclepack)

joss_as_of_2021 <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/front-matter/journal-notebooks/refs/heads/main/works_10.21105_2021-10-26.csv")
  
joss_as_of_2021 |> 
  ggplot() + 
  aes(id = title, 
      area = is.referenced.by.count ,
      label = title |> str_wrap(20),
      fill = published.date.parts |> as_date()) + 
  geom_circlepack() + 
  geom_circlepack_text(color = "whitesmoke") +
  coord_equal() + 
  scale_size(range = c(0,4)) + 
  labs(title = "JOSS citations as of 2021-10-26")
```
